locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text:
Sempurna, itu 1 kata untuk pelayanan semua crew di Mayflower - Marriott Executive Apartment. Dari mulai saya menanyakan pintu masuk parkir via telepon, layanan check in, security yang ramah dan helpfull, layanan restoran, hingga saat check out.

Sebagai 1st timer menginap di sini saya dapat free upgrade room, Alhamdulillah, terima kasih Marriott. View yang sensasional The Heart of The City jalan Sudirman hingga Bundaran HI. Room yang luas (lebih dari 80 msq) dengan kebersihannya sangat terjaga, complimentary kitchen set yang lengkap. Kamar mandi dengan bathub dan shower terpisah. Ada living room ruang bersantai bersama keluarga dengan sofa dan karpet, ada meja kerja dan ada meja makan dengan 4 kursi, tv ada 2 di kamar dan di ruang keluarga. Dilengkapi pula dengan mesin cuci + detergen. AC dingin, lift ada 4 dengan waktu tunggu yang cepat. Sarapan ada pilihan dine in dan take away (bukan delivery) dengan pilihan menu seperti buffet (bisa request lebih dari 1 menu), sehingga memudahkan untuk menjaga protokol kesehatan di masa pandemi ini. Sangat recomended dapat harga di bawah 1 juta dengan kualitas pelayanan dan fasilitas yang didapatkan.

Satu lagi,lokasinya menyatu dengan perkantoran, sehingga sangat dekat bila memerlukan menarik cash dari atm bank manapun, tinggal turun ke lobby.
title: Pelayanan Sempurna

text:
2 Bed Room di LT 31 view  ke bundaran HI 
Ruangan sangat luas = 100m2 . 
Kebersihan luar biasa tanpa 1 debu pun
Peralatan dapur komplit microwave + Dish washer + mesin cuci juga tersedia
Kolam renang bersih + ada kolam air panas sauna 

Operation Manager =Bu VINDA sangat ramah dan cekatan sampai mengantar kami ke kamar.
Salam kenal dr Sy ( Rudy - kolektor kartu sedunia) bu VINDA 

Sensasi mandi di bath tub sambil menikmati view ketinggian ibukota Jakarta
(Hanya sedikit dr banyak hotel yg bisa begini)

Buat kolam renang protokol covid19 sangat ketat ..Hanya 12 yg BS berenang >> di mana ada jam /booking time terlebih dahulu

text:
Menurut saya, menginap disini sangat menyenangkan.
Hotel yg berada persis di pusat kota Jakarta membuat tempat ini eksklusif, Pelayanan yg sangat memuaskan, dimulai dari check in sampai check out sangat di layani dengan baik oleh para staff

Fasilitas hotel dan kamar yg luar biasa. Benar-benar fasilitas Bintang 5. Kamar yg besar dan ada kitchen sama mesin cuci-nya sangat cocok untuk staycation. Ada kolam renang dan gym yg bisa di pakai dari jam 6 pagi sampai 9 malem, pool-nya indoor jadi ga udah takut jadi item. Yang paling oke lagi, kecepatan internetnya sampai 25 mbps, bener2 cocok buat staycation sambil nonton atau donlot2, anti buffer!

Kebetulan saya menginap di saat ulang tahun, dan saya mendapat kejutan berupa birthday cake. Perhatian yg luar biasa dari The Mayflower, Good Job to take my respect and love to your great service 😂

Dari sarapan juga sangat memuaskan, karena sedang covid jadi tidak berbentuk buffet tapi ga masalah, karena kita bisa request makanan yg kita inginkan dan boleh pesan seberapa banyak yg kita ingin. Keren! 👍

Intinya, Stay untuk liburan dan bisnis di Mayflower adalah pilihan super terbaik menurut saya. Hotel yang bisa memberikan solusi perjalanan yang memuaskan! Sukses terus dan tetap jaga Your Best Service. Pasti saya akan menginap disini lagi, see you again 😁🙏🏻

locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text:
Cek in tertulis jam 3, tp ternyata jam 2 sudah bs masuk. Love it! Utk hotel/apartemen bintang 5 lobby nya kurang wow ya, spt masuk ke perkantoran. Kurang sparkling dan ga ada wewangian khas hotel/premium apartment.

Strong points menurut saya : kamarnya besar bikin 2 toddler betah lari-larian, bath up cukup besar utk saya dan anak kecil dua uwel2-an, air panas stabil, air di bath up dan walk in shower sungguh deras (loveeeee bgt! beda bgt dgn keran kecillll bgt di wastafel muka dan wastafel piring). Dari sisi request saya minta highfloor dan bath up dgn city view, yg diberikan hanya high floor di 31. Its okay, thank you! Ada JBL Horizon utk musik, diberikan scr free handsanitizer dan tisue basah. Cool!

Weakness points : jalur/akses kurang jelas, apalagi utk pemula, kamar tidak wangi (but thanks when we're get in the ac is already on), linen tidak wangi (penting), toiletries tdk lengkap (mau minta keburu malas krn udh pengen selonjoran. Contoh tdk ada cotton bud, shower cap, sendal kurang, tisu refill tdk ada), selang air utk toilet (utk umumnya orangtua, khususnya yg bawa anak kecil spt saya, matters sih ketika anak poop hehe). Channel TV tdk menarik, dan kualitasnya buruk, malah jadi ga tertarik nonton sambil tiduran.

Oya krn terkait Covid-19 kolam renang tidak dpt digunakan dan breakfast di kafe (bukan restaurant) dgn kapasitas kira-kira 10 meja. Utk rasa, tidak istimewa (subyektif ya).

So overal lil bit under my expectation, but its oke tercover dgn keramahan para karyawannya. Thank you!
title: first staycation after almost 8 months stay at home

text: Saya sudah sering menginap disini. Dari pertama menginap sudah sangat betah. Suasananya serasa dirumah denggan tempat tidur yang nyaman. Living room dan bedroom yang luas. Service yg cukup baik karena saya beberapa kali di upgrade room dan bisa mendapat early check in tanpa extra biaya. Lobby kecil tetapi nyaman. Satu2 nya kekurangan bila membawa mobil sendiri agak jauh dari parkiran hingga mencapai lobby karena harus pindah lift dan berjalan sedikit
title: Sangat nyaman

text:
Tinggal bersama keluarga selama hampir sepekan di apprt executive dengan dua kamar tidur.

Sebagai anggota Marriot  Reward, saya dan keluarga sangat puas tinggal disini.  Lokasinya strategis, dan kamarnya juga bagus.  Saya membaca beberap ulasan sebelumnya mengenai beberapa keluhan, namun saya bersyukur bahwa saya tidak mengalaminya.

Kamar kami keduanya nyaman dengan kualitas tempat tidur dan perabotan yang bagus.  Kalaupun ada sedikit keluhan adalah suara dari kegiatan konstruksi pembangunan gedung didepan bisa sedikit terdengar. Semua perabot dari kompor, mesin cuci dan pengering pakaian, exhaust fan, dan oven bekerja dengan baik.  Akan lebih baik kalau aliran air di wastafel tidak dibuat memancar sehingga air tidak terpercik keluar pada saat kita mencuci tangan.

Kualitas kamar mandi juga bagus dengan debit dan tekanan air yang cukup sehingga kami bis amandi dengan puas.  Amenities di kamar mandi juga bagus dan wangi dengan jumlah yang mencukupi.

Makan pagi dibawah cukup enak, tetapi variasinya memang tidak sebanyak di hotel lainnya.  Namun para staff nya sangat ramah. Pilihan makanan di room service menunya juga sedikit terbatas.  Kami dua kali memesan room service, kebanyakan nasi dan rasanya enak.  Porsinya juga cukup banyak.

Kolam renang indoor tersedia di lantai 28.  Kami sangat menikmatinya.  Pada pagi hari kolam renang sepi sehingga kami nyaris menikmati kolam renang hanya untuk kami sekeluarga. Ada dua kolam air panas, dan kami sangat menyukainya. 

Sebagaimana dikemukan reviewer lainnya, tempat makan di lantai bawah terbatas, dan tutup lebih awal atau pada akhir pekan. Solaria tidak menerima pesanan antar diatas jam 7 malam,  Untuk persediaan tersedia star mart yang menjual beberapa keperluan dan makanan ringan. Jika sedang malas keluar, banyak restoran yang menyedia kan pesan antar.
title: Tempat yang menyenangkan untuk tinggal

text: Terletak tepat di tengah kota dan terdapat sejumlah warung makan dan toserba. Apartemen cukup bersih, terawat dengan baik. Dalam dapur tersedia peralatan makan standar. Saya sangat senang terdapat 2 TV, satu lengkap dengan pemutar DVD di ruang duduk dan satu di kamar tidur, dengan pilihan stasiun TV yang sangat beragam. Cocok untuk keluarga atau pun untuk menetap jangka panjang.
title: Apartemen berlayanan di pusat kota

text: Saya tinggal hanya untuk semalam singkat di apartemen eksekutif Marriot. Saya mengharapkan lebih banyak waktu untuk menikmati kamar yang luas, pemandangan indah atas Jakarta, dsb. Senilai denga harga yang dibayar, khususnya jika anda berencan untuk tinggal beberapa hari di kota. Sedikit lebih murah daripada "tersangka umumnya" dan lebih nyaman.
title: Mencari tempat? Pergilah kesana!

text: Sungguh sebuah pengalaman unik. Fasilitas hotel kelas atas dengan suasana seperti di rumah sendiri. Sejak kami tiba, staf nya sangat luar biasa. Keluarga kami selalu disapa dengan hangat oleh semua orang yang bekerja di hotel ini. Tak ada apapun yang kami minta yang tidak dibantu oleh mereka. Sarapannya menyenangkan namun tidak berlebihan. Layanan kamarnya mencakup semua yang kami butuhkan. Apartemen eksekutif 2 kamar dengan jendela di atap menatap langit kota... WOW. Kami pulang ke kamar yang sudah dibersihkan dengan baik oleh staff... menakjubkan. Fasilitas (gym, kolam renang, jacuzzi) benar-benar indah. Duduk di dalam jacuzzi menghadap pemandangan kota merupakan sebuah pengalaman unik. Satu-satunya hal negatif adalah kami sedang berkemas untuk pergi. Sisi positifnya, kami akan mulai menabung lagi...untuk kembali. Hotelnya terletak di posisi sentral dan memberikan akses ke semua area utama. Terima kasih Marriot, Roville Loos.
title: Salah satu hotel terbaik yang pernah kami inapi.

text:
これは素晴らしいホテルでした。 スタッフは素晴らしく、全体的な経験は素晴らしかった。 ホテルは古く、アメニティに問題がありました (MRT pass) 。部屋からの眺めはすばらしかった。 プールとジャグジーもとてもよかったです。 また泊まりたいです。 ホテル良い価格。

I stayed her for two night just to try and new hotel in the city and really enjoyed it. The biggest shock for me was that they had several fluent Japanese speakers which I appreciated as I struggle speaking English. I was upgrade for free due to my Marriott member status which was extremely nice and the room was very large for me and my friend. The view and the amenities in the room were great and it was really like a home away from home. The pool and the jucuzzi, located on the 28th floor, was also exceptional and the view from the jacuzzi overlooking the city was amazing. I do have a few complaints, particularly in the room rate that I selected which was supposed to include a unlimited MRT pass however when I tried to use it, it didn't work and said insufficient funds. I didn't say anything because it wasn't a major deal for me. I also felt that the hotel overall had an outdated look much like an old Vegas hotel. While none of these issues are bad it was something took this stay from a 5 star to a 4 star.
title: Great Hotel for Extended Stay

owner_response.text:

We would like to thank you as well for your great support being our travel partners by using our Marriott Bonvoy travel program for your stay.

Please do accept our sincere apology In regards to the MRT pass, we have noted and reviewing our process of giving the pass. We hope to see you back again soon at our apartments and look forward to welcome you

Warmest regards,

Alan Yuslan

text:
Checked in 3-bedroom apartment. It is located in highest floor (35th) of Indofood office Tower. It was pleasantly quiet at the tower during our weekend stay.

It is an outdated but still quite well maintained spacious apartment.
We love using the indoor swimming pool and whirlpool.

Most of the staff showed good services and attitudes. They quickly delivered the international converter and knife to our room when we requested.

The breakfast room at 1st floor is small. Luckily our family still got the table, when we started for the breakfast by 8.00. The food is tasty, though the menu variation were relatively less compared to the other same standard accommodation.
title: Spacious Apartment

text:
29階の部屋の空調の音が大変うるさく眠れず、Riaさんというスタッフに相談すると「すぐ点検します」と言ったが、改善されなかった。その後、ゴキ〇リが出たので部屋を同じ29階に変えたが、今度はウォーターサーバーの水に白い浮遊物（ゴミ？）がたくさん漂い、部屋は埃だらけ。ベットには蟻がたかり、トイレには蜘蛛。とてもじゃないが眠れなかった。翌日また部屋を変えることになった。スタッフはフレンドリーだが、29階には注意してください。
The noise of air conditioner was so strong, so I consulted it with Ms. Ria, and she said "We'll check soon." But, it wasn't fixed. Later, CockroaXX appeared, so I changed the room to other room on the same floor. Although, water from water server included much white dust, and there were much dust on a floor and a desk. Also, there were ants walking on the bed, and a spider in a bathroom. I couldn't sleep with unpleasant. I needed to change again. The hotel staff were friendly, but need to be careful for the rooms on the 29th floor.
title: 29階に注意/Be careful for 29th floor

text:
Recently stayed at the Mayflower Jakarta for approximately two weeks.  The one bedroom apartment was well configured and very functional.  The hotel includes a restaurant, room service from the restaurant and optional grocery shopping service.  Note that the kitchen is equipped with very basic utensils and pots - difficult to cook a complex meal.  No microwave but there was a coffee maker, toaster and kettle.

The pool and work out area are very good.  The pool is larger than you would expect and there is an excellent children's pool.
title: Mayflower - Good Executive Apartments

owner_response.text:
Dear Walkaboutfar,

I thank you for sharing your feedback on your stay at our hotel with the TripAdvisor Community. It is wonderful that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and their appointments during your two weeks stay with us. We are proud of the fact that our guestrooms are the largest in the city center and offer fabulous views of Sudirman and Kuningan. 
The indoor swimming pool with Jacuzzi is perfect relaxation point for family.  

It is unfortunate that the kitchen pots and pans provided in the units did not meet your expectations, though we are very flexible and happy to provide with any additional request for any specifications of pots and pans for cooking. We do in fact have microwave and oven in the room and will touch base with my team to explain all the appliances to our valued guest. 

I am glad to know that service delivery did match your expectations of the Marriott assure you that you will leave us with a more delightful experience.

I stayed in the Mayflower twice, for approximately 3 weeks each time.  I cannot say a bad thing about this place.  If I had not found my own apartment, I would stay there again while I am in Jakarta for business.  

The people and management were very friendly and sensitive to my needs.  Whenever I needed anything, all I had to do was ask.  The cleaning crew was fantastic and made sure that my apartment was spotless every day and that I had everything I needed.  I used the spa a lot and they have a first class team running the spa, and their massage therapists were first class.  The gym was more than I needed.

I loved the central location.  I could easily walk to work, but the staff was always helpful to get me a taxi whenever I needed it.

Thank you all at the Mayflower- Marriott Executive Apartments.  I appreciate all you did for me to make my stay as pleasant as possible.

text:
The Mayflower - now primarily operated as Marriott Executive Apartments - is an Aparthotel for long-staying guests. The rooms are nice, bright and the furniture is in good condition. Yet the equipment should be checked better before guests check in. Some of the equipment we had was not suitable for a 5-star property anymore (some of it never was....). The Location is also good, as it lies between the central Business district and the most popular Shopping malls (Grand Indonesia, Plaza Indonesia).
The staff is friendly but not always effective. Sometimes lack of Feedback or language issues can cause Problems. Yet we had no Major issues during a whole month.
Breakfast offers very limited Options. So you either prepare it for yourself in the kitchen of the room or you are happy with mainly local choices and limited assortment. Staff at the breakfast Restaurant is friendly and helpful.
The pool is a big disappointment. The pool is not heated and thus the temperature is quite low. Even after Swimming several rounds you dont seem to warm up in this - admittedly huge - pool. As a result the pool is hardly used by anyone. Only the Whirlpool has some guests now and then. In total it would make more sense to reduce the size of the pool and get it heated. And forget about pool-Service... You will find a menu but you would have to go looking for the staff to order.
I had massages several times at the spa and the treatment was always good. The rooms - like several other parts of the Hotel - look outdated and not according to todays 5-star-standards. Also playing spa-music at convenient volume seems to pose a bit of a Problem (some rooms dont even have this Option). 
Room Service was not convincing, when we had it. The taste was ok, but rather average. We preferred to cook ourselves then.
We were facing an unpleasant odour coming from the drain in the bathroom. Unfortunately this Problem could not be rectified during our stay and we had to use scented candles to deal with the bad smell. The bathroom also has only one handwash-basin. Thus if two persons Need to go to Office at the same time, it might get dense sometimes.
All in all we had a pleasant stay. Yet we do see potential for improvement in various points.
title: Longstay-Residence with some issues

text: We were very impressed by this apartment complex, from the security guys who were so sweet and looked after us every time we needed a taxi, which was a lot, to the desk staff who were all smiles, and even to the young man who would push our lift button for us to go up to our apartment..the apartment was really great, big Jakarta views, clean and spacious..the pool was wonderful, especially in the morning we would have a spa and then jump in the pool then go out for breakfast..good value for great service. Highly recommended..People complain about the traffic, and yes there was some congestion , but we tried to travel in the off peak, and that was ok, and the taxis are cheap..after all this ia a major city, like London, New York, etc so the traffic will be busy..

text:
1. Airpprt Transfer - It is better to be coordinated directly with the hotel for little difference in fare But u can better service as compared to Airport's.

2. Commuting Around - Taking taxi back to hotel, you shouldnt mention The Mayflower Marriot Serviced Apartment because hardly anyone know about this place. Its better known as "Indofood Tower".

3. Gym - The staircase to the gym is slippery at the edges od each steps. The friction patch should be pasted at the edges.

4. Staff - All of the staff i have encountered were Helpful, Courteous  and Thoughtful. Pardon me as i forgotten to tip some of them who have assisted me 1 way or another.

5. Comfort - My stay was very comfortable. Did not encounter any disturbance. Rooms were kept quite well. Maybe the cushions at the sofa should be washed frequently to raise the hygiene.

6. Location - Well situated at the city centre area if you are on a business trip here.
title: Good Stay

text: I stayed at The Mayflower Marriott Executive Apartments for 3 weeks in February 2018. The main reason I initially selected The Mayflower was the prime location along one of the main thoroughfares (Jalan Sudirman) in the CBD. Traffic congestion in Jakarta is an issue and being close by taxi or within walking distance of offices and malls makes the Mayflower a great location. As I quickly found out, however, the property had a lot more to offer than just a great location. The service at all levels was absolutely outstanding, I was made to feel extremely welcome and as a solo traveler I really felt at home. My deluxe one bedroom apartment room was very comfortable, quiet, clean with good amenities (kitchen and washing machine). The views from my room were great. WiFi was good. The gym was very well equipped with great views across the city. Breakfast choices were excellent with very attentive and friendly waiting staff. Room service menu choices were good and there are also a couple of eateries in the office building.
title: Outstanding service at all levels and ideal location in the CBD

Perfect price-quality! We’ll definitely come back in the future!

text: We have stayed at this hotel for four nights with our two kids. The staff was very friendly, the hotel was very clean. The breakfast was good enough to make everybody in the family happy given how our kids are fussy with food... The indoor pool was nice. I had a massage which had a discount, and I was very happy. Jakarta is not an easy place to travel with kids -distances are long, and transportation in that traffic is not very pleasant. However, staff at the hotel makes it easier for you... The hotel is located in a business compound named Indofood Tower (not to mix it with the other Marriott). There is an Italian restaurant underneath, which was good for us...

text: This property is conveniently located close to most attractions in the center of the city. We booked a one bedroom apartment. It's very spacious, clean and well maintained. It has a full kitchen and a washer/dryer. Linens and towels were fresh. Bathroom amenities were adequate. Lighting in the bathroom is a bit dim. A challenge when putting on make up. The reception staff are friendly and helpful. They made the check in/out process very convenient. The dining room staff are also helpful and accomodating. We were impressed with the massage service in the spa as well- professional and very good. We asked for help reserving a taxi to the airport for an early morning flight. Front desk staff made sure our taxi was on time and also packed a breakfast for us to take to the airport. Overall, service was consistently very good- always a smile, a warm welcome and willingness to help.
title: Great value!

text:
I have been staying at this hotel for the past 20 days. I am here on an official assignment and I thank my stars that I booked this hotel for my stay. 
It has been a joyride from day one and everything here is excellent. 
The hotel is located on the main road and is just a 5 minute walk from my office. The rooms are excellent and the facilities including the gym and the pool are world class. 
The room service and the breakfast buffet is top notch as well. 
It is in a building called Indofood and thus there are 2 grocery stores in the building. There is a 7/11 store near by. The hotel arranges for taxis and also a pick up from the airport. 
I have 0 complaints and I just love this place. I will be leaving though in 10-15 days... SIGH!
title: Pure Class and Excellence!

text: The hotel has a very low profile and you can't see it from the street. Tell the taxi driver Indofood Tower, and the lobby is just behind the office elevators. Otherwise, the hotel's official entrance is around the back in the basement. My deluxe 1 bedroom was huge although the facilities are showing their age. There was a plasticky smell in their rooms, so just get them to open the window locks and aerate every day when you leave. There isn't much choice for food downstairs, but Plaza Indonesia / SCBD are 10 minutes away in good traffic, or you can walk 5 minutes to the BRT stop. Staff are very courteous, quick, and helpful, which more than made up for the minor furnishings issues. They even accompanied me to find a doctor and offered lighter breakfast foods later in the day. Impressed!
title: Aging but Great Staff and Service

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

I am glad to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us and that you were impressed with the staff quality and them going that extra mile to take care of your stay. Our apologies on not meeting your expectations with regards to the hotel upkeep and furnishing standards, which I will ensure that we have made a note and will share your feedback with designing team. 

We are strategically located in Sudirman road which has an easy access via main Street and back lane of Setiabudi thus enabling out guest to commute faster. Your detailed feedback with number of areas especially on Food & beverage offerings caught my attention and I am sorry for not being able to meet your expectations here however you will be glad to hear that we are working on the new Menu with additional variety of food and beverage options for our guests. 

I have further discussed your smell concern at the room with my Housekeeping and Engineering Team to ensure that it is one of the case in isolation and not usual concern in our rooms. I will personally investigate further to ensure no further recurrence. 

We very much look forward for the opportunity to have you back in the not too distant future. Until then, take good care!

Regards,
Shashank Sinha
General Manager

text:
Mayflower is located in a very accessible location. The entire business district is within a 10 minute drive, which is a big factor given the notorious traffic at Jakarta. 
I stayed at the serviced apartment and I can say that the rooms are very big and spacious and are well equipped with all the appliances you might need.
The apartments are located on high floor which allows for a very quiet and peaceful environment. 
The staff is extremely courteous and always greet guests with a polite smile. The entire team here is very kind and helpful and made my stay here memorable.
The apartment has a fully loaded gym and a swimming pool which I was used when I stayed here.
I think these apartments are suitable for long as well as short stays.
title: Awesome place to Stay and Live!

We are pleased one of our valued guest thought so highly of us! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and indeed choosing us on your recent trip to Jakarta. 

I am so glad you enjoyed every bits of your stay at our Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments, from our well-appointed rooms with its modern design, our friendly associates, our strategic location in heart of Sudirman and the food!

We will be here when you are ready for your next return at our property. Until then, take care!

Regards,
Shashank Sinha
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We had stayed here mid October and was beyond impressed with the staff and their helpfulness. Huge/clean room, Good if you are traveling with family but also with friends. The Hotel location is in the middle of city with makes sightseeing easy. Again the staff here is amazing...
title: Great stay and will return

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We were delighted to have you staying with us and so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments. 

We have a fantastic team of associates that really enjoy taking great care of our guests and I'm more than glad that you appreciate their efforts on making your stay a comfortable one. I'm also pleased to hear you enjoyed our strategic location and that appreciated the facilities which go in hand in hand with our prompt services. 

We can't wait to welcoming you back at our property, hopefully sooner rather than later!

Regards,
Shashank
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I had to stay here this week as the Saudi King and his entourage had booked most of the main hotel rooms in Jakarta. The apartments are at the top of a office tower block and located from 28th to 36th floor. Reception and a small café are at the ground level. The apartment itself was huge with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, large lounge and kitchen. More suited to a long term stay than a couple of nights but at a very reasonable cost compared to JW or Ritz Carlton. Breakfast selection was ok with egg station and freshly cooked noodle dishes
title: Huge apartment at reasonable cost

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We are happy to hear you enjoyed every bits of your stay at the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments! Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your great experience on TripAdvisor.

I am happy to hear that since you are such loyalist of our sister hotel that you could only choose us when they got sold out, our constant endeavor is to deliver the best of experience for our guests. Though with number of highlights we also work on the constructive feedback which our loyal guest share. 

I'm glad you enjoyed our spacious and comfy rooms. Our housekeepers work very hard to keep the resort in tip top shape every day and happy to hear you were satisfied with our standards of cleanliness.

We do believe that our associates are the backbone of our property and we are more than glad that you appreciate their efforts on making your stay a fabulous one.

We can't wait to welcoming you back on your next stay with us and not necessarily wait for our sister hotel getting sold out again. Until then, take care!

Regards,
Shashank
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We had stayed from 16 - 18 February 2017. Huge room with all the facility inside (Typically of Apartment) Good if you are traveling with Family. With the Kitchen inside the room, I feeling like at home. The Hotel location is in the middle of city and easy to access around. The staff are nice and friendly. They help me with all the request. Really love this place and for sure will try to stay bit longer next time.
title: Spacious Room

owner_response.text:
Dear Pirgiantara,

So happy to read your review about your stay with us and the spacious room for your family was perfect way to celebrate family time. And the little gourmet kitchen in our rooms gives that added advantage for our guest to try out some home recipe. 

Our central location does give the advantage to all our guests to commute and beat the traffic by using our alternative access to the hotel via Setiabudi. I am sure you found it convenient too. Lastly our staff our biggest strength and single biggest asset, they feel very motivated when they read such reviews and their recognition. I will surely pass all your compliments to the team and look forward of welcoming you soon to our property in your next visit to Jakarta.

Regards,
Shashank
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The property is located in the Indo Food complex and not very easily located for a new comer. The rooms are big spacious and very homely. They come with practically all facilities, but being a long term stay place, do not expect quick services. The staff are extremely good and helpful. The breakfast menu is very limited and does not reflect an international Marriott collection. The best thing was they had a Indian Vegetarian section, Thanks to their GM, which helped vegetarians have good food [ atleast one item is there]. Overall good place, but you can opt for other Marriott properties as many are in town.
title: Great Facility for long term stays, optional for business stays

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Ramachandran,

We thank you for reviewing us on Trip advisor.

It gives us immense pleasure to hear that your experience at the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments has been a pleasant one.Your kind words towards the property and the services we offer is much appreciated. We truly appreciate your acknowledgement towards the vegetarian Indian food at buffet breakfast spread in The Café. We are continuing to challenge ourselves for the offering at breakfast and get better.  

We are sorry for not living up to your expectations with regards to prompt and quick service, which I will again revisit with team and ensure we get better moving forward. We look forward of welcoming you soon. 

See You Soon,

Warm Regards,
Shashank
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
If I choose an Marriott runned Hotel or Apartment I expect 5* service, design, cleanliness and decor. And as a SPG gold member I expect some extra service.
The welcoming at Mayflower was nice, friendly, warm and as expected. 
The room was huge, nice, a bit run down and a bit smelly. A bit nice, a bit not so nice.
First I need to spray parfum to every room to make me feel comfortable.
The next day we talked to the staff about the very bad smell of the corridor (32. floor) and they dont understand which bad smell. The smell is so ugly, i covered my nose with my tshirt while walking from lift to room or room to lift.
Improve please.
Overall it´s nice, but for the same price I stay now behind the Mayflower at another Apartment Residence and I got much better Room, bigger, nice smell and more feel like at home.
At least it was a disappointing stay at Mayflower. and till now I didnt get my marriott points on my membership.
title: so so for an apartment, disappointed about Marriott

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Gunadi,

As we take great pride in delivering extraordinary hotel experience for our guests, we have regrettably fallen short during your stay. Please accept my sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused in regards to the room upkeep and smell.

I have reviewed this with our housekeeping team to ensure that the room make up are up to our cleaning standards and it should smell fresh and clean throughout the room and corridor, that no other guests experience the same moving forward. You will be glad to know that we 

Mr. Gunadi, our apologies on the point credit which I will personally look into it and credit it at the earliest. As a Gold Elite guest we sincerely value your feedback and will ensure that your detailed constructive review helps us getting better. 

Thank you for your loyalty and would request you to please allow us another opportunity to serve you and extend much memorable experience for you which is synonym to Marriott.

Regards,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The room spacious and clean. Good for those who will bring family. They also have kitchen so you could cook. Very comfortable beds, we all commented on the great sleep we had. Great staff too. Too bad, when I was stay in this hotel (31 Dec 16 - 2 Jan 17) the pool cannot used / under renovation :(
title: Spacious room

owner_response.text:
Dear Pak Jaka,

I am thrilled to read your review and thank you for your endorsement. We really pride ourselves in ensuring the guest experience the best of services and quality product when they choose to stay with us. I am glad to hear that you loved our spacious room, gourmet kitchen design which helps you prepare your own food if you wish. 

Our beddings are world class and they are best for comfortable sleep. I am so happy to hear that you got the quality of stay experience with us. I am sad that you could not avail our pool experience this time around as we are renovating it for far better experience and next time when you are here with family do take a dip in our pool. 

Until then, please take good care of yourself and we look to welcome you back with another memorable experience. 

Regards,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I have stayed for 2 nights at this property. All the staffs are great, special thanks to chef Yudi and Chef Krisna who made my 6 months daughter pure porridge.
Cant wait to stay at Mayflower again on my next trip to Jakarta.
title: Trip to Jakarta

owner_response.text:
Dear Derry,

I'm glad to read that you enjoyed every short stay at the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments with your family. The warmth and welcoming experience by our staff goes long way in winning the loyalty, I am sure that you experienced the same during your stay with us I will be sure to share your very kind words to Chef Krisna and Chef Andy who will be excited to hear about your appreciation note specially with regards to your baby porridge. 

Once again thank you for the recommendation. I and team are already waiting for your next return. See you back in Jakarta real soon!

Regards,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text: Stayed for the weekend, a small reunion with friends. Our room on the 30th floor with an amazing city view. Spacious room which is more than enough to accomodate all of us. Check-in was smooth and we were provided with the smoking room that we requested. The highlight of the night was definitely the kitchen. Everything was in working order. We cooked roasted chicken and it went well without any problem. Hot water, air conditioner, and room condition was well-maintained. Thank you for a lovely weekend.
title: Weekend at the Marriott

owner_response.text:
Dear Felita,

Great to hear that you choose us for the reunion weekend, our spacious room does give that advantage to our guests to enjoy the space as well as gourmet pantry where you can cook your own special meal. 

I am happy to hear that our first impression which we sincerely work hard on did impress you and I will extend your acknowledgement to Front Desk Team. The upkeep and maintenance is one of our top most priorities and hence I was particularly happy to find that you loved each and every aspect of the room, facilities and appointments.  

I am truly grateful of your review and we sincerely look forward to seeing you soon in our hotel.
Sincerely,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Checked in with my whole family for a 3 night stay. Was very impressed by the security standards of the hotel. Very detailed attention paid to ensure guests safety and security yet not intrusive. Good Balance!
Room was ready earlier than my requested time. I met the hotels GM Shashank; Very impressed with his genuine attention to focus on my family having a great stay. He went over and beyond to ensure that everything went perfect. 
Staff at the hotel mirror his attentiveness to guests especially Fitri from Front Office. Thank you for getting the travel adaptors and helping to baby proof the apartment. Another person was Hussin. He took care of my visits and excusions and went out of the way printing maps for the taxis and ensuring they knew the routes to take me and my family by. I really appreciated that. 

Thank you everyone at The Mayflower. I have nothing negative to comment on. Its been a great 3 days.
title: Spacious Apartment. Great People!

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for choosing us for your recent visit to Jakarta, as Platinum Elite your valuable encouraging comments help us a lot in ensuring that we extend that seamless and flawless “Home away from Home” experience for our guests.  

It gives us immense pleasure that you enjoyed your stay with us. Your acknowledgement towards the property and the services offered by us is much appreciated. 

Your kind words for the Fitri and Hussein will be shared with them and their success story will be recognized in our next Town Hall meeting.

Trust you enjoy your last day with us and we look forward to seeing you soon on your next visit to Jakarta.
Sincerely,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I not often eat at the hotels weI stay at, preferring to go outside and discover restaurants nearby, but this evening was different. As my wife and I walked at of the lift I noticed there was a happy hour offering discount on beers, so decided we'd have a pre-dinner drink at the Mayflower Cafe. On sitting down we were warmly greeted and it was recommended we try the lamb curry, which was quite a reasonable price and something we don't get to eat often. To cut a long story short it was delicious and sufficient quantity to satisfy any hungry traveller. Washed down with cold beer, this mea was a treat, and the hospitality first class.
title: Wonderful Meal and service

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We thoroughly enjoyed reading your review at the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments. Our food promotion is about ensuring that webring out wonderful local Indonesia cuisine for our guests. I am so glad to learn that you loved our January-February food promotion – Tongseng Kambing (lamb curry). It is indeed Javanese delicacy and really enjoyed by our in house guests. I will surely pass your compliment to Chef and our service team.  

Once again thank you for the recommendation. The team and I are already waiting for your next return, hopefully sooner rather than later.

Regards,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Apartments are definitely starting to show their age. Cabinet door came
off the hinge, dishwasher door looked about ready to come off and fridge conked out on us. All that aside, it was a decent sized two bedroom unit that was great value compared to hotel. 

Decent breakfast buffet spread and room service was quite good as well. Very friendly and helpful staff, and the location was easy to get out to the Malls and other shopping areas. 

We made good use of the kitchen facilities as well and cooked a number of meals in the apartment. 

Pool was under renovation during
our stay, though the gym had adequate cardio and weight options. 

Would stay again, though the rooms could use a refresh.
title: Good Value - A bit dated

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your review of your stay at the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments. Though we are delighted to read your review that you loved the spacious room and in room gourmet pantry facilities which you and your family enjoyed the most however the condition and upkeep of the room did not meet your satisfaction. 

Our sincere apologies of not being able to meet the expectations and as Loyal Elite guest you would be glad to know that we have already started the soft redo of the rooms and would look into the appliances upkeep and maintenance issues of the room that you have mentioned. I assure you that we will work harder to ensure that upkeep and maintain the highest international standard is our top most priority. 

We just can't wait to welcoming you back when your next travels bring you to Bali again. Until then, take safe travels!

Regards,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Went on a business trip n stayed for 2 nights.found the staff to be excellent n very helpfull...rooms are very spacious n clean.great location in the heart of the city. Will definitely recommend stay here
title: Excellent stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Titima,
Merry Christmas and Season’s Greetings from all of us and thank you for the review of your recent business trip to Jakarta.
Our central location in heart of Sudirman business district does give the added advantage to our guests who can commute avoiding busy traffic. Our spacious room and fast internet is what is loved by our business travelers and I am glad that we delivered our promise during your recent stay. 
Wishing you a very Happy New Year in advance and sincerely look forward of welcoming you back in 2017 to our property again.
Regards,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
On Christmas day,  Me and best friends from high school  decide to have a playdate for our kids, or most likely staycation date :)

We are so lucky being upgraded into 2 bedroom, it is very spacious which very ideal for 6 of us and yeah the kids is over excited. We love the kitchenette so much,it is full equip that we can cook, so we can fully enjoy our stay and togetherness without going outside to the mall to eat, is like having picnic in the center of the city and we truly enjoy it. Definitely will stay again!
title: A very pleasant stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Ibu Dian,
Merry Christmas and Season’s Greetings from all of us and we are very happy that you choose the special occasion and your happy reunion with us.
I am glad that team very good care of all of you and upgraded to our 2 bedroom unit which is indeed very spacious and allows families and group some quality time. I was happy to hear that the appliances and appointments of the room’s best suited your requirements for the stay. 
Wishing you a very Happy New Year in advance and sincerely look forward of welcoming you back in 2017 to our property again.

Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Lovely spacious clean rooms made me feel right at home. The location is very central on Sudirman. The room service is great. I really enjoy going for a swim in the indoor pool and spa that is located on a high floor...and just watch the lights.
title: Excellent

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for a positive review of the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments on this platform. We take immense pride in our city center location and I am glad the same worked in your favor. 

Our ultimate endeavor is to ensure our guests feel at home whenever they choose to experience us with best in class amenities and personalized intuitive service. Our swimming pool is highlight of the facilities which is half Olympic size and is indeed biggest in the city and the scenic beauty from our top floor rooms overlooking the Sudirman and Kuningan is spectacular. 

We look forward to your next visit for yet another memorable experience! 

Regards,
Shashank
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Stayed here 1 night for business purposes. Was a great experience, I can find this as the most complete apartment in city centre. The room is very spacious with separate bedroom. Kitchen, dining and living room is very huge for 2 people, it can fit to welcome any guest for 4-5 people more. They have laundry machine and complete kitchen with all utensils to cook. Room is quiet, most of apartment have problem with elevator noise but I didnt find it here. Breakfast experience was great, internet connection is very fast and steady. The staff is very helpful, we were at rush to go to meeting that time and FO team is very quick to manage all transportation and do experess check out. They inform to driver and we just get to place on time. Its indeed a great experience and I definitely will come back!
title: Great experience, warm helpful staff, and spacious room

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for such a fabulous endorsement of the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments on this platform. 

Such constructive feedbacks from esteemed guests such as you go a long way in enabling us to understand what our guests need and exceeding their expectations. 
We take immense pride in our city center location and I am pleased to know that it was of great convenience to you. 

It gives me great pleasure that the service by our team of associates has been acknowledged by you – they certainly go the extra mile to ensure guest delight. I am glad you had a pleasant stay and enjoyed the facilities and F&B on offer. We look forward to having you stay with us again on your next visit. 

Regards,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
It's a good place to spend your weekend in Jakarta. We stayed here on the long weekend of Dec 8 to 11 2016.
I'm in love with this hotel since I arrived. The staff were super friendly, especially the security who makes us feel safe after the security issues in Jakarta a couple of weeks ago.
The front desk staff were friendly, helpful, and very informative. They answered all my questions about the hotel facility and what to do in the city. The welcome drink and lite bite were a good idea, especially after spending 2,5 hours trapped in the traffic from the airport to the hotel.
The room was huge and comfortable. It feels like a home away from home. The kitchen set and washing machine is a nice addition compared to your usual hotel room.
The breakfast is simpler than other Marriott's hotel but they provide your daily breakfast needs with the best quality.
For sure I'll come back to this hotel when I visit Jakarta!!
title: Best choice to spent your weekend in the Big Durian

owner_response.text:
Dear Rhio,

Thank you for your time and this review on your stay at the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments.

It feels wonderful to receive such positive feedback from our treasured guests and I am grateful to you for sharing your experiences with the Tripadvisor community. I am glad you enjoyed your stay and found the amenities and services were to your satisfaction. I eagerly await your next visit to the Mayflower Jakarta, Marriott Executive Apartments and look forward to providing you with true personalized and consistent hospitality!

Regards,
Shashank
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text: Very comfortable and convenient place. It was a relaxing stay in Jakarta. However it's a bit too far to any shopping or restaurant areas and the restaurants in the complex close too early. If you are going for s late dinner you have to order in house dining.
title: Comfortable

owner_response.text:

Great to know you enjoyed your stay and found the amenities and facilities to your satisfaction. Our location in the heart of business district of Sudirman does indeed prove beneficial to both business and leisure travelers and I am sorry to hear that you found our Central Business District location not convenient. 

I eagerly look forward to your next visit to Jakarta and hope we get the pleasure of serving you once again!

text:
Staying here is always incredibly excellent! From the moment I step in, I can feel the warmth, the friendly faces and not to mention the spacious room. They always want to make your stay enjoyable.
All the staff are very helpful and moreover great location! Delightful breakfast to start up your day.
Will definitely coming back.
title: Excellent service

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
If only... They put sound proof windows! :)
They have rooms headed to the main street-maybe will be more noisy OR headed to the setiabudi area-you can hear the sound of morning pray-call before 5am, i used my noise cancelling earphone then went back to sleep. 

Located in the main street of Sudirman street, very convenient to travel to my meeting sites. I went through Setiabudi, Kuningan roads.

The apartment is huge, for a one-bedroom unit. The amenities are complete, even they have coffee maker, dishwasher (yes dishwasher, even i was wondering why thy have it since it's a service apartment-but not a complaint tho!)

The design is a bit old, and it looks a bit old, but everything well functioned. Fast response from the staff, and the egg Benedict-from in room dining is fantastic!
Not a big fans of their breakfast area tho, very small and if you come in busy hour, you may need to wait till someone leave.

Spa, swimming pool and gym are available, haven't use them yet, but it looks ok!

The staffs were so nice and attentive!
May come back again with noise cancelling earphone!
title: It would be rated 5 if only...

owner_response.text:
Dear Anastachi,

Thank you for a positive review of your experience at The Mayflower Jakarta Marriott Executive Apartments.

Our ultimate endeavor is to ensure our guests feel at home whenever they choose to experience us with best in class amenities and personalized intuitive service so it gives me great pleasure to receive this recognition. The central location in heart of the Sudirman business district does give unique advantage to our guest in reaching to their office building or malls. 

I am sorry to hear about the noise concern which you pointed out and will ensure that next time you are with us do let us know and we can have room away from any noise detractors. I was happy to hear that you loved our egg benedicts in the room service and would be glad to know that me and team are continuously working on the breakfast experience and flow of service in the space that we have. 

I am glad you had a pleasant stay and we look forward to having you stay with us again on your next visit. 

Regards,
Shashank

text: Had an opportunity to have dinner at The Cafe at Marriot Mayflower Jakarta.  I love the place.  Its spacious enough and cozy.  The food was creative and interesting as the Chef made a special ox tail stew with rice and sambal for me.  Something different and taste YUMMY!  Had the opportunity to stay in the rooms for 2 nights as well, i was very impressed with the space and the facilities included in this building.  The prices are real value for money and i would love to recommend all my friends who needs to visit Jakarta for leisure or tour to really consider this place as they make their rooms really cozy, very squeaky clean and super comfortable overlooking the beautiful city.  This place has everything you need and a great place away from home.  To top it off the GM is an amazing guy!  Well done!!!
title: Great food at The Cafe

text:
The mayflower is centally located at the busy Sudirman area in Jakarta.
Apartments are very spacious and comfortable with a stunning view on Jakarta. The Apartments come with a fully equipped kitchen, international TV channels, Wifi and a very nice bedroom and bathroom. The mayflower has a fully equipped gym, spa and sauna. Staff is nice and helpful. Breakfast was good but was the same everyday. All in all i can absolutely recommend this place especially when you str travelling as a Family.
title: Perfect for Families

text: We stayed in Mayflower after my relocation to Jakarta, until I found a more permanent place. The serviced apartments are in a secluded and secure area although being right in the middle of Jakarta. It was in walking distance to my workplace so was very convenient avoiding the daily traffic. Mayflower provided a decent size apartment unit serviced daily, a generous breakfast, stylish and clean interiors. The kitchen had all amenities needed to cook. Internet connection was included in the room price, very high speed and supported several devices. Spa, pool and fitness center are of premium quality. Recommended for business travelers and families alike.
title: An oasis in the center of town

text:
I was there earlier this year for leisure visiting family and friends. A friend of mine booked this apartment for me. All staff hotel were very friendly and helpful. Just a minor thing in the bathroom. The powerpoint was not working so I had to use the hairdryer in the bedroom which do not have a mirror close by. 

My friends brought some food for lunch that day. The hotel staff were very helpful in getting additional plates and cutlery to the apartment back and forth so many times without any problems as we wanted some other things for our little party. The view from my room was spectacular. I left my curtain open all night to enjoy the night skyline of Jakarta while reminiscing the times I spend growing up in this beautiful City. it was a memorable experience.

text:
Stayed in a 3 bedroom apartment for 2 nights with colleagues.  View of the city was really good, even with the Jakarta haze.  

Apartment was super spacious, including two good size bedrooms with double beds and a master with a bed that seemed bigger than a normal king and walk in wardrobe.  Kitchen had everything you needed although a microwave would be handy, especially if you're living outside of home.  Two large bathrooms with separate showers and baths.  Big living area and dining table made for a space that would be easy to live in with a big group.

Small things which could be annoying - apartment was for up to 6 people, with 4 booked, but only 2 bottle of water were provided.  We called for more, not sure if we were charged.  Some of the rooms had a stale food kind of smell, which was unpleasant until we got used to it.  There were tiny ant bugs in the bathrooms which are yuck but I've seen them in offices and hotels elsewhere in south east Asia.  Check out took over 15 mins for them to check the minibar and whatever else they wanted to do.

When I booked I was told breakfast would be extra but on arrival found out it was included, which was a great surprise.  There is a small breakfast selection but it included the things most travellers want the most - egg station, fresh cut fruit, toast, coffee, juice, etc.  We ordered room service one night and had to call after an hour, only to be told that they had a small kitchen and we had ordered a lot...

Beds are pretty comfy.  Shower pressure fantastic.  Included amenities pretty good but half shampoo bottles are not a good look.  Internet was okay but a occasionally patchy.  

Service was almost always very friendly and polite.  It was disappointing that the master bedroom uber bed couldn't be changed for twin beds, even though that is what was in the pictures I was sent.  Check in was very friendly and included a welcome drink and cold towel.

Hotel was quite hard for some taxi drivers to find.  Some recognised 'Indofood building' but one driver went in circles for 30 minutes and we had to guide him using google maps.
title: Nothing fancy, far from perfect but just what is needed

I can assure you that my team and I are constantly refining our service delivery levels and sincerely hope to welcome you back and provide you with a more memorable experience!

Regards,
Shashank
General Manager

text:
I stayed for a weekend in town get away,  in 2 bedroom apartment with wife and 2 toddlers for 2 nights. The room itself is very good and comfortable. Plenty of common space but the bed room was rather small. We were placed on one of the rooms with view toward Jalan Sudirman, which is quite nice scenery in the night . 

The kitchenette was well equipped and well maintained. Although for this level of property I would expect to see more premium coffee like Nespresso or Dolce Gusto, or Keurig machine, instead of cheap drip coffee machine, instant coffee and tea they provided. The room also equipped with washing machine with tumble dryer. I tried to use it once, but it was so noisy and it was installed on the hallway closet close to front door, that I afraid i was bothered other guests in nearby units. 

The breakfast was kind of a downer. Very small place and limited options. I think the taste also not so glorious.

The hotel have a big indoor swimming pool and also Jacuzzi pool on one side of the pool. Also it have a kid's pool. The kids were enjoying the indoor pool. 

For family with little kids I think this property is not a right choice, albeit the apartment itself is very nice and the staff was very warm.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I stayed at the Mayflower for over a month. It was in every way, a perfect stay. The apartment itself was spacious, well maintained and tastefully decorated. The living room and the bedroom were large, the kitchen was fully equipped and the bathroom was extremely spacious. They also provide a washer and dryer in the apartment itself, which is super convenient. They also provide daily cleaning services, and the housekeeping staff is very friendly and accommodates all of your needs. The front desk staff were exceptional - they helped me out several times with taxi booking, local language translation and made sure that my every need was taken care of. I also used the gym and the swimming pool regularly - both are very well maintained and spacious, so it never feels crowded. These apartments are also located in an upscale part of Central Jakarta - one of Jakarta's best malls is a 20 minute walk away, and there are several eateries around the building. All in all, my apartment felt like home and I really grew to appreciate the staff there. Would HIGHLY recommend this gem of a property to anyone who's looking for a comfortable short term or long term stay in Jakarta.
title: A serviced apartment that feels like home

text:
This is the first time I am writing a review while still staying in the room. The service level has impressed my friends and myself the moment we stepped in. 

Location
10 mins taxi ride away (with no jam) to Grand Indonesia, Plaza Indonesia and Pacific Place.

Security
Typical of hotels in Jakarta but done in a very polite and professional way all the time. Security staff even assisted to press the lift button for you and on two occasions, offered their help without being asked when they saw that I had issues with my room card.

Reception
The best front desk team I have met, regardless of the day or night team. Besides being address by the last name, probably because of the numerous occasions I called for their assistance. Check-in was smooth and fast and we got an upgrade to the executive apartment. The front desk staff brought us to the room personally and did some explanation of the room. The front desk also recommended us the various dining options around the area. 

When called upon for assistance (additional robes, towels, etc), requests were seen to it immediately and we got the items and assistance within 10 minutes. On the last night of our stay, we sought their assistance to order KFC for us and needless to say, they helped us placed the order and took the trouble to send the food up to our room. As staff of Marriott, they did try to offer us the room service option but was never pushy when we chose otherwise. 

Room
Big and comfortable bed!

Housekeeping Team
Kept the rooms tidy and clean. Good job!

Cafe Team
Polite and attentive to clear the plates and offered us the various beverage options even when we did not ask for it. 

Gym & Spa Team
Another polite team!

This is one impressive team who are always ready to assist (be it taxi or room items). This Marriott team deserves the due recognition.

Thank you for taking good care of us and we wish you well. Will definitely recommend my friends to stay with The Mayflower when they visit Jakarta.
title: Everyone was impressed by the service

text: This hotel is a good place to sleep.The beds are divine and the air quality is good. The rooms are large and the ceilings are high. The rooms are well insulated against sound. I used the gym and enjoyed it (bring your runners if you want to use the gym facilities). The chlorine pool is large.  The rooms are a bit quirky. It was hard to find an electrical outlet where I could plug in my computer, for example, and then I had to charge my computer and my phone alternately because I couldn't do both at the same time. The light switches were in odd places. The shower door leaked.  It was handy to have a washing machine in the room -- but nowhere to hang the clothes if you don't want to use the dryer. The restaurant was so-so. Be warned that they use MSG.
title: A good hotel

text:
Stayed nine nights while on a business trip in Jakarta. Very conveniently located as the office was in the tower adjacent to the Marriott.
Good size apartment for a single traveler- would be OK for a couple as well. 
Very comfortable bed with feather pillows. Some noise from the traffic despite being on 29th floor, would probably be quieter if facing the other side.
Good value for money
Kitchenette could have a microwave.
Very good service as often the case in Indonesia
Hotel restaurant with good local dishes, efficient room service; there are other restaurants in the area downstairs, most of them are closed on Saturday and Sunday 
Area deserted on Saturdays and Sundays

text: 3 nights. Guest service was the highlight--from front desk to housekeeping to gym to security, all outstanding. Room was large and impeccably clean. I didn't use the kitchen. Sound-proofing was very good (the mosques begin amplified calls to prayer at abt 4:40am). Gym/spa was nice--clean and spacious. Breakfast and lunch buffets were good and a good value. Building had a few other restaurants and a Coffee Bean but no adjacent mall. I liked that this hotel was smaller and quieter than the mega-hotels surrounding Plaza Indonesia or in Kuningan, but still close to everything.

text:
The staff at Marriott ensure that the experience is memorable for you in every way. What I particularly like about these apartments is their size, kitchen and the high ceilings. I've stayed in 2 bedroom and 1 bedroom apartments and both were adequately furnished and serviced. The residences offers great fitness and food options. For fitness, it has a spa (good masseuse), and sauna and steam room, 25 m indoor swimming pool with 4 comfortable lanes, big gym and other options like yoga etc on some days of the week. Food is a decent spread of both western and eastern cuisines and 24hr room service menu too. The staff and especially the general manager are very courteous and make every effort to make their short and long term guests feel at home. The residence is close to all the new fancy malls both up and down the road. Within the complex, you have ATM, food (Japanese restaurant is particularly good) and 7/11 kinda store too. 
Don't think twice for booking this place. You'll enjoy the comfort, service and feel at home.
title: Huge rooms, great service and convenient location!

text:
I work in Jakarta for up to six weeks at a time and stay at the Marriott Executive Apartments as it is close to my office and project office.

The rooms are serviced apartments, with even the basic one bedroom apartment spacious with separate bedroom, bathroom, laundry room with washer/dryer and living area with kitchenette. I have been upgraded to other one bedroom suites that have bigger bathrooms and bedrooms and being at the end of the building do offer better views to the north or the south.

The beds are comfortable, and a good sized desk and chair are provided in  the bedroom as a working area. Having a separate bedroom form the living area is nice, especially for an extended stay as you don't feel as cramped.

The complex has an indoor pool and a gym on the 28th floor that is reasonable well equipped with a range of cardio and weight machines. The 28th floor also has a spa and massage facility.

The restaurant provides a great breakfast with a selection of western and asian foods. Room service is quick and good quality at a reasonable price and provides an easy alternative if getting back from the office later in  the evening.

The location, on JL Surdiman is handy to major shopping malls such as Plaza Indonesia, Grand Indonesia and Pacific Place so there is a large range of options for eating out or getting a drink.

All the staff from the front desk, restaurant, kitchen, housekeeping and security want to provide the best service at all times, they are all friendly and approachable, and can't do enough to help. They really make the difference to your stay over a period of weeks.

text: Located within the bustling city area of Jakarta city, this is a high security serviced apartment atop a commercial office centre. Getting to the lobby has to undergo at least 3 security check-points. Breakfast is buffet style & made simple, available only at the small coffee house within the lobby only, no club floor. There is a gym & spa centre within. The bedrooms & living room are well spaced. Adjoining is a well equipped kitchenette. The only draw back is there is no charging power points in the bedrooms except at the bathroom walls for blow dryer. So considering a use of laptop or charging cellphone could only be done at the living room. Overall is a pleasant & comfortable stay.

text:
Stayed in this apartments numerous times and i dare say >5. The only reason i did it was because of jakarata's traffic and its proximity to office. There are no amenities in the area other than a local small minimart at the lobby and 3 restaurants shared in the Indofood office tower. Getting a taxi is a pain as the main road is clogged and you have to fight with the office crowd to get one. The hotel is able to get you one, but that would set you back by another 15mins and they are also fully capable for screwing it up. 

Staffs are undertrained and often have no clue how to deal with request other than check-in and out. As i have stayed in the hotel multiple times, no more than 3 gadgets are allowed internet access and with that, it choked the system as it remembered me with my gadgets. Calling the frontdesk gets you a number to call the Philippines helpdesk who spends the first 10mins to verify your identity and next 30mins to open 1 extra access to your gadget. And the frontdesk is incapable of helping you any further.

For 2 stays, i had major problems with the shower. On 1 stay, i had to stay 7 nights and everyday the shower had No hot water and everyday i have to call somebody to fix it and everytime they tell me its fixed and the cycle continues. Jakarta is hot but the AC in the building is cold, so you don't want to shower cold. On another stay, the shower had no pressure, and it is the same thing, you call, they come, they fix, shower, no pressure. 

Now we come to breakfast...lets not talk about it. 
The traffic is a pain but you get over it. To deal with the traffic, day's work, this hotel, our complicated relationship is over. I recommend JW Marriot if you are Marriot's member, Intercont, maybe Mulia.
title: it is over

text:
The room itself is good.  The gym and pool are good.

The location is adequate.  At night, the location is poor - it's on a stretch of road that is completely dead at night - just a mini-mart in the same building that shuts around 7, a pizza restaurant and the hotel bar is the breakfast room, and is exactly as small, quiet and soulless as that promises. 

This same breakfast room in the morning is too small for the number of rooms.  Come down to breakfast - completely full.  "Can we get you something to take away?"  "No, you can have enough tables so that I can actually get in or you can give money back for the breakfast included in the room rate"

The housekeeping is quite terrible - have multiple instances now of:

- No towels at all in the room (generally discovered upon emerging streaming wet from shower)
- waste bins not emptied in room
- on one occasion the sack containing the contents of everyone else on the floors waste bins sitting cheerily forgotten in the middle of my floor

I have to stay here but would not if I had a choice, I would stay nearby in one of the hotels.

text:
I stayed at this apartment from May 21st 2014 to May 24th 2015. I can't count how many times I have stayed at this apartment. My family always choose this apartment because the price is reasonable and we are happy with the big space that they are offering. Though I have to admit that the room will need renovation soon because it looks a bit worn out and their breakfast menus needs to be improved.

However, during my last visit there, I experienced something unusual. Soon after I arrived at the apartment (in the evening), I did the check in at the reception. Nothing's weird with the check in. Few moments later (I was still at the reception) the people at the reception asked me if I have knife on one of my suitcase. I asked my mother and she said "Yes". So I relayed her answer to the reception and asked on what seems to be the problem.
They said that the knife can't enter the room. And when i asked for the reason, they only said "the hotel's policy". I find this is weird. And the reception said this " we provide full set of knife inside the room. Just leave your knife with us and you can take it when you are checking out". I disagree with their terms, leave their reception and asked the concierge to deliver my luggages since I got one baby with us and he started to get annoyed because their reception-lobby was a bit hot.
And guess what ? They send it right away.
So, really what's the fuss about the knife after all ? I tried to ask their management using their twitter account and they answered that they will have someone to follow up my report. But no one came.

Apart from this annoying incident, I can still recommend this place to stay. Especially if you are with one big family.
title: Needs a bit of improvement

This place is great if you are planning to stay at least a few weeks in Jakarta bringing along your family. 

Facilities in the room include a kitchen, living room and even a washmachine+built in dryer - a major plus on you have lots of laundry to do on the weekends.

Location-wise it is pretty decent, along Jalan Sudirman it is the busiest road in the whole of Jakarta, but on Sunday's the road in front is closed from 6am until 11:30am for bikers, jogging allowing you a chance to have a leisurely walk. Just be sure not to be there once the road is opened again for traffic.

Staffs are friendly and if you stay long enough, remember about all your preferences making your stay all the more enjoyable. 

Breakfast is average while the gym is great.

text: I stayed for more than three (3) months at this lovely American hotel (serviced apt) in downtown Jakarta. The hotel is in Indofood tower. The modern room is well appointed and impressive. There are full kitchen, fridge, spacious living room, two wide screen TV, and a walk in closet. The floor of the living room is marble. The bathroom is all marble. View from the room is very beautiful. Location is perfect in Sudirman which is the best location to efficiently travel to southern and northern Jakarta via toll road, even to Airport and Bandung. Price slightly cheaper than Oakwood, but the location and quality is far better. Beating Jakarta traffic is a must. There is a Silverbird taxi station at the entrance which I use twice a day because of the excellent value  for money, just make sure to ask for E class Mercedes or Alphard car. There is a enormous indoor swimming pool. The fitness center is spacious but standard. The view from the pool and fitness center is very beautiful. There is many ATM machines on ground floor for local currency. Two prestigious malls the Plaza Senayan and Grand Indonesia are the best place nearby to eat. The hotel staffs are very courteous and helpful. If only other Marriott in the US has similar standard. This hotel is much better than other category 2 Marriott hotel in the US. I would stay here again when I visit Jakarta. I am an Starwood SPG member but for Jakarta I choose this hotel. Excellent value for the money.
title: Lovely home in downtown Jakarta

text:
As a long time international business traveler (also SPG Platinum and Radisson Gold), I have had my fair share of hotel rooms. I usually stick with business hotels from international chains as they have standard service levels and mostly I am happy with.

My Marriott Executive Apt. stay was in my second trip in Jakarta. In my first visit, I stayed in Le Meridien located less than half a mile down the road. I hated to walk even that distance because of heat, smog and crowd at peak hours. This time, our local office gave me two options. First one is Intercontinental which is literally next building from my office and Marriott Exec.Apt which is across the street. In my fourth week in Southeast Asia, feeling a little like home with full kitchen, living room and a separate bedroom sounded like a great idea for slightly more than what I would pay for a regular hotel room. After all this is Marriott, how bad it could be? 

Boy I was wrong... I quickly realized service and quality was not comparable and part of the reason why is that this property is sharing the building with other offices. Although it has a separate lobby, the limited amount of space makes common areas small and I figured it might be contributing to maintenance issues. 

Upon uneventful check in, I got into my 30th floor apartment. Apartment was a good size long and narrow one bedroom with a separate laundry. It looked clean and modern except that it had a very slight odd smell. I was tired and liked what I have seen so I stayed. The first problem started after i tried to log on wifi. It took me multiple attempts to connect to the router but I was able to at the end. The second problem started when I wanted to connect with my phone. Upon multiple attempts, I was again able to connect but then concluded internet connection clearly has a problem which was confirmed after my laptop connection dropped. At this point, I decided to call the front desk. Front desk manager politely informed me that their technical service desk is not working on weekend (!) and I told her I am on a business trip and need reliable internet connection. She offered to come upstairs and take a look. After 10 minutes of her working on my laptop, I was back online. Himm, ok, I lost about an hour but still... 

The next morning, I woke up to a bad smell coming out of bathroom. Took a shower, which leaked water in the middle of the bathroom despite closed shower door. I was sure I was not the first person seeing water on bathroom floor but a little surprised the water and drainage were quite far from each other. Besides there was no angle so I had to swipe my little pond with towels which took me to the source of bad smell: Drainage. At that point, I took a careful look at the bathroom, the quality of the work, materials etc were terrible. Uneven edges, molded grout, plastic shower head, non sealing shower door etc. Called front desk, told them the problem and went out. 

The next two days, the bad smell was not there but room still had some odor and my connection problem was back. Called front desk manager and asked for the IT guy this time. They came together and supposedly fixed it. After that I still had connection problems but it was better than before.

On Saturday and Sunday I had buffet breakfast at the small restaurant next to lobby. Food selection was very very limited and nothing comparable to full service hotels. I had already decided to never come back again due to internet and stinking bathroom and breakfast sealed my decision but it was not over. On Monday morning, there was simply no empty table in the tiny restaurant. I had to wait for someone to finish. Frustrating. Wednesday morning bad smell came back. I thought it was fixed. It was again coming out of drainage and my theory is it happens when someone above or below me is taking a dump. Otherwise it would not be intermittent. I went down and ask for director of rooms or general manager and neither was in property. Operations manager came out of office, listened to my problem and told me it will be fixed today. In the evening, I came back and saw the sophisticated (!) fix which is blocking the drainage with aluminium foil. Good news is smell was gone, bad news is there is no way for water to exit. Brilliant. 

In my first day, had seen %20 off for SPA and decided to try it out. I went down to 28th floor, saw excellent pool and nice gym. The spa was next to the gym, nice, clean rooms. I was happy to relax and ready to fall into sleep during my 90 minutes massage only to jump up my seat after I heard a very loud music and screaming people. I asked for the SPA associate and asked whats going on. He told me a group rented the gym for a workout session! Worse, since they paid for it, they will stay. Hotel is renting the gym to obviously noisy event next to their spa!!! I told them this was unacceptable and they offered me to go to a different room. I changed to more silent room but i lost my mood already. 

I am no difficult customer and don't write reviews as I have received consistently standard service from all big chains but my experience with this property was entirely different. If you value quality over quantity, I recommend to go to a traditional hotel. This property might be suitable for big families with kids but not for me. This is not a hotel for a business traveler. As for the staff, it would be unfair to slam them as these are beyond their control. I always told my friends if I ever own a hotel, all my staff will be Indonesian. They are the most hospitable people on earth and these guys are no exception. It is sad that they work for this property.
title: Huge disappointment for a business traveler
