text:
Make sure you understand that you're getting a nice apartment with kitchen, living room, bedroom and bath.  You'll have to stock the kitchen yourself.  So understand that you are getting an apartment first, and a hotel second.

There is only one restaurant and I think I got food poisoning there.  Only people who are stuck without food in their apartment kitchen will eat there and so you can usually count the customers on one hand.  They probably have to hold over a lot of food too way too long.  For this reason alone, I wouldn't come back here.

The second reason I wouldn't come back here is that the street traffic outside the hotel is god-awful.  Don't expect to be able to go anywhere during morning or evening rush hour.  We took a taxi and covered about 500' in ten minutes.  Gave up and got out and walked back to hotel. :-(
title: Trapped by traffic.

owner_response.text:
Dear Sir,

Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback regarding your experience. I am certainly disappointed to know that your stay was not all that it could have been. 

We are sorry for your unpleasant experience with our restaurant and your feedback has been shared with the team. Be assured that we take our hygiene standards very seriously and no exceptions are made at any time.   

With regards to your comment on our hotel location, the hotel is located in the business district of Jakarta and just like any other part of this city, traffic can be a problem during peak hours. In this matter, we are very sorry to learn that our location was not ideal for you.

I hope that the remainder of your stay was enjoyable and I would be obliged if you give us an opportunity to serve you again and restore your confidence in The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We had a good stay at the Mayflower Apartments in Jakarta.  We only stayed here for two nights, but it was worthwhile.  The pool and gym were good, and it was centrally located and close to the business district.  High security at the entrance, but I think everything in Jakarta is like that.  I would return.
title: Good

text: Stayed for a night and the experience was unsatisfactory. Booked an airport pick up via the apartment which was good as it allowed to board the Silver Bird taxi faster compared to others. However although the Silver Bird driver was repeatedly told by the Mayflower staff the location of the hotel, it still did not stop the driver from behaving in the typical Indon driver style-asking me the foreigner for directions plus stopping at least three times to ask for directions from random people on the road. After much ordeal I arrived safely and managed to check in without too much hassle only to find my key card not working. Thus I had to waste time after a very long journey to head downstairs to get another key card. I was fortunate to meet the manager on duty that night and told him he should accompany me to ensure the key card works. Lucky for me, the manager was with me as sure enough the second key card did not work and the manager had to let me into the room using his master keycard. He gave some excuse about the batteries not working. I had to spend another 15-20 minutes waiting for the technician to fix the problem on my door. All this time I could have enjoyed a nice warm bath - sigh. Apart from that room service food quality was yummy and breakfast although simple was also enjoyable. The key highlight was when I departed i asked the front counter lady to book me a Sliver bird taxi that has credit card facilities. She also helped me communicate to the driver to ensure the driver understood the different destinations I needed to go before sending me to the airport. That part went very well - thank you to the lady working on 4 July 2013 around 11am-12pm.
title: Can further improve

locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text: We stayed in this apartment for 2 nights. Fantastic and huge apartment. Centre of jakarta. Close to business district but also great starting point for leisure trip. Breakfast is fine. Good gym and pool. For sure we are going to stay here again.
title: Superb appartment, spacious room, perfect location, very friendly staff

text:
I stayed there for one night i was planning to stay longer but i canceled the other nights 
Staff were very friendly but...... 
Rooms and washroom were not clean you can see dust everywhere specially in the corners 
Washroom was smelly 
Carpet dusty and old 
Water was leaking from the water cooler 
Bed sheets and blankets had stain on it 
Breakfast less than what is expected for Marriott 
Utensils in the kitchen were not enough and old 
No good supermarket or grocery store nearby and with traffic in Jakarta this is big problem 
You can defiantly find better options in Jakarta with even less price
title: Big disappointment

text: I stayed at the Mayflower when the floods affected Jakarta on January 2013. The location on the right side of the road, helped greatly in ensuring I could get to the airport. The staff were also extremely helpful to get me a taxi that could get me to the airport in time for my flight. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
title: Good location & good service

text:
Stayed in a one-bedroom executive apartment and following are few feedbacks:-

- very busy location and difficult to get in/out
- only one resturant in-house that serve breakfast, lunch and dinner
- tried some of foods from in-room dining menu and I should say Beef Stake was poorly cooked and not a good memory from other meals either.
- room was acceptably clean, fresh and tidy to Marriott standard; likewise for reception by staff
- all cooking and kitchen wares were available as well as complementary water cooler stand.
- it sounded very noisy due to heavy traffic outside
title: Good for a long or family stay... Busy location

locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments
The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments
The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments
The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments
The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text:
Pros:
- quality of apartment is good and it's cosy
- tight security 
- helpful front office staff and security
- provides a barrel of mineral water in the kitchen
- beautiful pool and gym

Cons:
- small selection of breakfast items, although what's served is tasty
- situated on a road that's perpetually jammed all the time, so getting to anywhere takes a long time
- road noises can be heard
title: Excellent 2-bedroom apartment on a very busy street

locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text:
hotel staff were very helpful organising taxi pickups to and from airport ( do this as taxi rank in jakarta always crazy busy)

hotel is on top of a tower and your room key only lets you onto your floor and lobby.

rooms are huge 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms allowing a city view from a bath or shower or a private internal shower.

hotel gives a place of solitude in a very busy city
title: a secure location in jakarta

text:
I've stayed here a few times an I do like the additional space that this gives you over the standard hotel room.

Pool is quite big and gym well appointed.

The only draw back is the very small breakfast/restaurant, which has a limited menu/selection.

I'll stay here over the Kapinsky due to it being heaps cheaper.
title: Central apartments, nicely appointed

text: Was here on a business trip for 2 wks but brought my spouse. Secure card access to rooms but the cards never work. Restaurant breakfast sub par - chef didn't know how to cook eggs - buffet food old and serios concerns with food handling/freshness. Purchases signature spa treatment, but therapist was annoyed at having to travel from regular Marriot location - no music, no aromatherapy, I was just beat upon. Location in an office tower means in house food optios only availible weekdays - and poor quality (fastfood). Need a taxi to travel anywhere. Internet in house extremely expensive and free wifi in reception and restaurant was problematic - my BB wouldn't work. Would not meet expectations for the business or pleasure traveller. Consider other options seriously.
title: Advise checking out Fraser suites, Four Seasons Residences, Le Meridien, or Mandarin instead.

text:
I stayed here for 2 months, in the 2 Bedroom executive apartment,as part of my business trip. Located in the central part of the city, Accessibility to a lot of offices and most of the good malls, is very good.
Most things about the place are nice- being new, the furnishing is new; the layout could have been better according to me, with better space management between two rooms. The Master bedroom is big and spacious with an attached well sized bathroom. The second bedroom is comparatively smaller. The drawing area is good with a relaxed feel to it, and an open kitchen. 
The kitchen, according to me, was ill-equipped if you intend to do serious cooking, especially Indian food, but the Manager of the place, Mr. Amit, was nice enough to provide us with a pressure cooker, an essential utensil for Indian food.
Staying on the 33rd floor, I would say the view was the deal maker for my 2 months.
title: Good for a long stay

text:
Room was nice, and clean.  Wired internet only....and it wasn't reliable.  Would just stop working after 3 hrs of being fine.  English skills of staff aren't strong.  Not hotel car available...must wait 10 min for a cab. Do not get a manicure or pedicure here.....total joke and very poorly done.  I ended up having her stop after 3 nails and removing the paint she put on.  
There is a cafe for dining in the hotel, but always looked vacant.  I ate there once and got 5-6 bug bites on my legs.  

I won't stay here again.
title: Not great

text:
We have stayed at the Hyatt, Kempinski Hotel and Kemp Residences on long term stays...more than a month. Jakarta isn't exactly a place to see anything from your hotel, so don't expect to find a hotel in a park.
The other top quality hotels mentioned had severe Internet problems, both in terms of connectivity and time. The Kemp disconnects you if you're idle for 10 min, and I was frequently unable to connect at the Hyatt for hours at at a time.
The Mayflower will radio a taxi, and like at the Kempinski help you tell the driver your destination..only the Kempinski requires you to use the more expensive Silverbird taxi. The staff is fabulous. Any repairs needed were done..immediately and well. The staff seems happier and less stiff than the other two. I've seen tons of serviced apts...and this was the only one of two that felt livable. The reviewer from London had some good tips, too.
title: Comfortable, efficient, friendly residence for long term

text:
Room very spacious and up-to-date. Spa and gym also suffiicent. Retsurant has really poor food quality-rather a place to avoid. Same with breakfast - very limite choice and service.
So great if you want a spacious room, less good for service and definitely a no go for any food
title: Great place for stay in Jakarta-if you only need the room

text:
I am on business assignment and stay there for 6 month from Aug 2010 to Feb 2011. The service quality us excellent throughout my stay. Washing machine doesn't work well, changed in a day; neighboring room too noisy, management decided to sound proof my room in two week; pants bought from shopping mall too long, front desk help me to get mended for USD3. The list goes on. I know most of the staff there after two week. Everyone friendly and inviting. The only annoying thing is the security check everytime I come back from outside. However this happen everywhere in Jakarta.
Food in restaurant always the same but after a few tenant voice thier disgruntled they alternate the food variation.
Gym and swimming is a bug plus to this place, finally I found somewhere with practical indoor facilities and not just for photos. The pool always clean and good size and length for a few laps after8 hours of work.
title: 6 months stay with consistant service quality

text:
Last summer, July 2011, I was in Jakarta visiting my dad who happens to be stationed there. My family and I stayed at the Marriott Executive Apartments for a week. I had an incredible experience there. The apartment I stayed in came with a living, kitchen and three rooms- two rooms with double beds and a spacious neat master room with an attached bathroom. As soon as I walked in on the first day, I was amazed at the immaculately clean rooms as well as the tastefully designed living and the compact kitchen. Each room came with a modern state-of-the-art flat screen TV, double beds – king sized bed in the master room and beautiful portraits hung appropriately on the white walls. 
Amongst the things that I liked most was the magnificent view we got overlooking the city and the infinitely long main street in Jakarta- Jendral Sudirman Street. Whenever I found myself in the lovely lounge, I would invariably end up standing by the huge-sized window overlooking the busy traffic and the incessant flow of cars on the busy road. It was a fascinating sight! One wonders where all these cars came from and where they were heading to! 
In addition, like most women I love the shops when I travel and was I not glad when I heard that our hotel was right in the middle of a busy thriving shopping area! I was certainly in the right place. The shopping in Jakarta is simply heavenly. There is this place called The Plaza Indonesia Mall which sells all the branded items you can think of. We could beguile an entire day walking in this massive place and still not finish shopping. I highly recommend this shopping outlet for those who love to splurge. 
Finally, this review would not be complete if I do not mention the breakfast provided at the hotel. It is a buffet breakfast style. The thing that amazed me was that it served food from almost all parts of the world- Italian, Chinese, Japanese, Western and Singaporean amongst others. However, I always ended up gobbling up the local dishes as I really enjoy spicy yet rich flavour that these cuisines offer. All in all, I highly recommend tourists who would want both comfort and convenience when in Jakarta to stay at this astonishing place!
title: A Convenient Home away from Home!

text: 19th April - 22nd April 2012, 2 x 2 bedroom Apartment. Service was impeccable and the rooms was immaculate. I took the whole family from Australia, Singapore to Jakarta for a 4 day shopping and food fest. From the moment we arrived we were greeted by smiles and nothing was too much by the staff. Helpful and cheerful they gave that extra touch. The rooms was clean daily and it was comfortable. We requested Golden Bird Service and the cars always arrived on time even at the airport. They have a lovely small quaint resteraunt which we had breakfast, good delicious selection. It might not be big but how much can you eat seriously. Plus we are surrounded by shopping malls and resteraunt just have to know where to go. Room amenities was great the oven is also a microwave as well its good that my husband read on the manual on how to work everything. We will be back again at the end of the year!!! Recommend to all
title: Best Service Apartment in Jakarta

text: stayed in a 1-bedroom apartment and it was a great experience, being very comfortable like living in a condo. there was a washer/dryer (although they do not provide soap), a kitchen with oven and stove top (induction) with full size refrigerator and even a dish washer. no microwave oven though. complete living room amenities (TV, sofa set, DVD-stereo player) and dining table. the room is spacious and comfortable with large desk to work on although not a lot of sockets nearby for plugging in. comfort room is nice also. breakfast was included on the ground floor café that serve not a lot of choices but good enough to fill you in. restaurants available on the ground floor as it is in an office building and there are a few other selections nearby. taxi cabs and transportation is also not an issue. only problem I have was when checking out I have to show proof the internet is included in the rate (email) and when I prepaid for taxi cab going to airport, they weren't able to communicate and handover a paper or something to them that I have to call back the hotel as the taxi is unaware. other than that, it is value for money and would definitely be on my top list of where to stay when i'm in the area again, specially if I will be with family.
title: excellent serviced apartment!

text:
My Husband and me, stayed here only two nights...then we went to the North of Thailand: It was our Honey Moon...
Fantastic Hotel, Central and Luxory...Very clean..
The staff is good, their english not so good, but we didn't need to speak with them.
The restaurant is good, but it didn't had a wide choose of menu..
Our suite was wonderful...
Bangkok is not a very nice city but this Hotel can make You forget the noise and the bad smell of the city....
title: Perfect!

text:
The Mayflower Marriott is a very nice place to stay,everything is nearby.The apartment is super clean and maintained.It definitely worth the money.The only thing that they need to fix is the service and coordination. If you book a car with them at the airport,make sure they arrive on time and bring a board with your name on it,I ended up with two different drivers from the Marriott after waiting for 3 long hours at the airport. The airport pickup is just a waste of money.
And also the service of the hotel,they take forever to give you what you want if you want something...sometimes they forget and you have to call back to insist.
And last but not least,the internet connection,the internet person on line isn't very helpful and friendly,the wifi connection is a bit tricky to activate on your device if you don't bring your laptop
title: Very nice suites,clean,nice location

text:
Stay for 3 nights, great room with cozy living room, got great night view also big kitchen.
Located at Central Business District and easily reach mall surround the apartment.
title: Comfy Place to Stay

text:
I have traveled to many places and lived in many service apartments/hotels. This will easily go into the top 5 in my list.

Situated in the busy business distinct offers a lot. You are very close to the few high-end giant shopping malls in Jakarta e.g. Senayan City, Plaza Indonesia etc. There is a coffee bean downstairs and a few other restaurants

The one bedroom apartment comes with a very comfortable king size bed and the room is amazingly huge. Bathroom is nice and clean. Kitchen is fully equipped with dish washer, oven etc. I enjoyed cooking most of my weekends there!

Pool and gym are great as well. Swimming pool is like heaven! The place get very quiet at night and weekend. 

As the rule of thumbs in Jakarta, never travel alone on the street at night and be sure to pick Blue Bird taxi ONLY.

Short note - if you are planning for a trip to Indonesia, get 150k local currency prepared before you leave Indonesia. You have to pay airport tax when you get your ticket. No ATMs no change! You need 150k !!
title: Best serviced apartment

text:
I had stayed in some Other Marriott hotels and apartment around Asia, Mayflower Jakarta  was not a comfortable enough place to stay...
The Rate we paid is quite high for what you get..
and The Funny thing is.. ( Quite embarrassing and disappointing )
I booked the Hotel apartment Mayflower Marriott Jakarta for 2 nights ( LUCKY us, we booked only 2 nights ,after the 3rd day we moved to Kempinski JAKARTA ), As We checked in , the front office clerks told us that the breakfast is only for ONE PERSONS ??????????

How come that you booked the apartment for 2 persons and you get only breakfast for ONE PERSONS...?? THATS WEIRD...

at the END of the stay, they TOLD US that the agent gave a wrong information about the breakfast, which surely for 2 persons... LUCKY they did not charge us for the Breakfast... but in a 5 stars hotels and apartment like MARRIOTT, We deserved to get a compliment service ( what ever it is ) as they did mistakes and we ended up spending extra money for the service that we already paid for....!!!!!!!!!!!
We took breakfast outside with our own charge ( in another Fine restaurant in Jakarta )..
what a shame ..!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1
As we checked in to our room, We found only ONE pair of Sandal, ONE pair of Bathrobe , but the room was clearly booked for 2 persons ....!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! and they served Instant COFFEE ( Nescafe ) in 5 stars MARRIOTT Mayflower JAKARTA accommodation ...
The shower was good but the shower handle was broken, so when we opened the shower the water goes all around the shower cabin..!!! the 2nd day its still the same... NOT REPAIRED..!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! the staffs did not checked as they did their daily room cleaning...and not well maintained... 

but anyway, We had some fun too in MAYFLOWER Marriott Executive Apartment  Jakarta.. the staff are very HELPFUL and Friendly... Specially MISS HAPPY.. SHE is the star..and the front desk staff as well as the restaurant staff.!!!

one more thing..!!! 
The price we paid has included Internet WIFI... but Its tooooooooo Complicated to acces it.. It took about 5 Human resources include duty manager to help me to log in.. ( too Complicated rules and birocrazy ).

The BED is old mattress and not that comfortable ... but we slept anyway,,,,

Warme regards

CHANDRA
title: Experience MAYFLOWER Executive apartment Marriott Jakarta

locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text:
For my husband and I, The Mayflower was above all our expectations.  

Our apartment was big, beautifully furnished, with a very comfortable bed and an amazing marble bathroom. All kitchen amenities were new and working in perfectly order (with all user guides available). Breakfast offered a lot of choices; gym was very well equipped and pool was good. The hotel is in a short walk from a residential area (Setiabudi) right behind the building where you can find some good local restaurants and business; also, it is near CitiWalk, a small mall, with a very good food court. Bluebird taxis waiting time was less than 5 minutes during the week and about 10 minutes on Sundays. You can also easily walk to Setiabudi bus stop for the Transjakarta bus, a very convenient way to avoid traffic jams. 
U-turns are not very popular in Jakarta, so I would prefer to cross the road in front of the hotel to get a taxi on the other side if I was going North of the city to save time/money. Big luxury malls, such as Sudirman Plaza, are less than 10 minutes by taxi/bus and there you can find a very well supplied supermarket. 

Finally, the service -- it was the one of the best we have ever received. The staff was simply amazing, very helpful, attentive, kind and always with a big smile. My overall experience was wonderful and I will definitely stay there again.
title: Amazing for a 2-month stay

text: I made the mistake of booking here as it carried the Marriot name.  What we didn't like about the apartments - poorly furnished in the living/dining room, middle of nowhere, difficult to get a taxi from (min wait 45 minutes), if you arrive on weekend there is a minimart that takes min 15 minutes to get to by taxi for some essentials, apartment comes with almost nothing - we had to buy our own sponge for kitchen, salt and pepper, detergent, etc - many of these things i would have expected from an apartment that charges as much as they do.  TV sound was intermittent, took 25 minutes to connect laptop and ipad to wifi using phone support, electric stove couldn't be turned off and emitted much heat, took 35 minutes for waters to arrive using room service, air-con in bedroom is really, really loud - I could go on and on.  What was good - the rooms are spacious - we booked executive 2 bedroom apartment.  But poor furnishings leave apartment feeling cold and uncomfortable. Sofa is tiny and cannot seat 2 western adults comfortably.  Staff are friendly, security is very thorough, beds are really comfortable.  We have stayed in Jakarta many times and would recommend anywhere else before here - its really due to their price - you can't help but expect a great deal more.  There is nothing to do in the hotel - only 1 very small cafe, a very cold indoor pool, very little else!!
title: Really disappointing

text: I stay in a lot of hotels and this is by far one of the best. The staff are very helpful and friendly, the security is second to none and the rooms are amazing value and well kitted out. Everything you would expect from an upscale hotel and amazing service. The pool has an  awesome view.
title: really great hotel

text:
The rooms are excellent and the service is prompt and sufficient. Only downside was that the internet was not free and even then a little spotty at times, recommend you get a sim card that supports 3G and thether using your iPhone.

For a posh place like this expected slightly better quality towels and bathroom ameneties. But i consider that minor in my book.
title: Spacious & Secure but with some shortfalls

text:
I have stayed at Marriott Mayflower Executive Apartments in Bangkok and enjoyed it very much, so I thought I would give this one in Jakarta a try.  It did not meet my standards.  The apartments have plenty of space and are equipped well enough, but the furnishings were tired and could use refurbishing.  The rooms were long, narrow and dark.  Not very inviting.  The worst part however is the total isolation you have by staying in this location.  Over the weekend the few fast food outlets in the lobby are closed.  There is literally nowhere to walk to.  A taxi ride in the evening to a nearby mall (3 KM) took one hour due to traffic, each way! 

To their credit, the staff at the hotel is very nice and competent.  One warning for anyone interested in Marriott reward points, you only get one night's credit for every three night's stay at the executive apartments and if you have Gold or Platinum elite status, you do not get the amenities of free internet and free breakfasts.  Given the poor location, tired rooms and lack of expected elite status amenities, I will not be staying at this hotel again.
title: Stay only if you are willing to be isolated from everywhere else

text:
Booked on Marriott web site at pretty good rate. Resident apartments with all you need for extended stays and in style. 
Great view of Jakarta business district if pollution allows it. Very kind staff and lots of security to go through as to be expected at American properties in Jakarta these days.

No where to go (without a local guide) on foot. At the ground floor can get some local fast food and there is a coffee shop.
title: good value

text:
I stayed in this apartment for 3 nights with my wife and 9 months baby. The apartment is located in Indofood tower, i was confused to find out the entrance and the lobby so i had to ask the security. The security has to check everyone and every bag entering the premise which i can tolerate due to the bombing threat.

The receptionist was very helpful when doing check in and he even walked me to our room. When we entered our room, the room is spacious for 3 of us where it has kitchen, living room, and separate bedroom with bathroom. They provide all necessary utensils from spoon, fork, knives, plates, mug, glass, pans, water boiler, microwave, stove, washing machine etc. We found this very helpful since we have a baby so we could prepare fresh food for her. The room also has 2 air-con controller for living room and bedroom which are so handy, and there is also internet available both wired and wireless. The swimming pool is also great with two jacuzzi and gym equipments, it was like our private pool since no one uses them during office hours.

We upgraded our room into 2 bedroom apartment on our last night stay, we got a much bigger living room, 2 bathroom but smaller bedrooms. We did an early check out at about 4am to chase our flight and the hotel staffs were so helpful and quick to get concierge and trolley into our room.

In overall, we were delightful with the service and the room that we paid. I strongly recommend this apartment for family with children especially who needs a 2 bedroom apartment since i think it costs less than paying 2 rooms in a 5 star hotel
title: Nice apartment space in town

text:
We stayed booked the apartment for more than 5 months and got quite disappointed with the service provided by the IT staff. First, the apartments are nice but lack kitchen utensils and you can hear the noise from a room to another. So nothing extraordinary with the accommodation. However, because we had a long stay, we had agreed on a free internet connexion for the apartment and its occupants. The internet connexion was, VERY, VERY bad (the wireless was NOT working if more than 3 were using internet) and we had to call the IT department many times. Also, when the bill came, we realized that 2 internet connexions were free but that the 3rd one and whenever we had guests, had to pay quite an indecent amount of money for a connexion. Even though we stayed more than 5 months, the staff didn't do any commercial gesture regarding that and we had to pay about 300 USD per months just for these extra connexions. Also, they had a problem with their land line system: they charged us for amounts of 400USD a month, despite the fact that we were just making some local phone calls. Noticing these problems the second month, we asked for the details. If they were always prompt in sending the invoices, they were very slow, even absent when it came to this situation. Once they admit that there was a problem: the land line bill showed a 57 seconds call for more than 40USD but to my knowing the communication problem has never been solved. They have just refund a very little amount of money: these particular 40USD as it was surreal but pretended not to understand that they surely had a problem with their system. My colleagues and I are used to this type of serviced apartments but we have to say that this one was particularly disappointing.
Good note for the cleaning staff though: always smiling and available
title: Unacceptable communication service

text: Great location and Amazing view from room, i love it!
title: This is awesome!

locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments
The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments
The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text: We were 6 and the 2 room apartment came cheap. Additional beds were free. It seemed we were the only people in the hotel for we saw very few guests. Pool is empty. Right in the center of Jakarta.
title: NOT CROWDED

text:
仕事で２週間利用しました
1泊20,000円のホテルですが、いろいろ問題がありました。
喫煙ルームを希望しましたが、空いている部屋が禁煙しかなかったので、空いたら部屋を交換してくれるという話でした。
しかし、２週間最後まで禁煙ルームでした。😭
その他は
・朝はあったはずのトイレットペーパーがなくなっていた。
・朝はあった洗濯機が帰ったらなくなっていた。
・バスタオルが交換されていない
・インスタントコーヒーが補充されていない。
・小さいアリがいる

いろいろ問題はありましたが、従業員はみんな親切で立地条件も良いところです。
title: 値段の割には・・・

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr, Norihsaf2016, 


Greetings from The Mayflower Jakarta – Marriott Executive Apartment, 

First of all we would like to thank you for your time in giving us a very detailed feedback for your stay at our property. Your highlight on our team service and location are very much appreciated and will surely pass this compliments to our team. Mr. Norihisa,  please do accept our sincere apology for the unfortunate experience stay that we would not want any of our costumer. My team and I have always appreciate this great gift of feedback from our respected clients like you to strive and for better future. 

Actually we had prepared smoking room 3 days after your arrival, however the team did not follow up thru to you. We have make a note smoking room preference on your profile for your next reservation. Please rest assure most of your amenities replenishment issued has been attended by our team and once again thank you for being our eyes and also always remind us through your feedback.  Please do not hesitate to contact me and will make sure that you will have better stay. 

Once again, thank you for your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to our property
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

locations.name: The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments
The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments
The Mayflower, Jakarta - Marriott Executive Apartments

text:
初めての宿泊でした。まずは、チェックイン時の説明がとても丁寧でした。お部屋も1ベッドから3ベットにアップグレード。リビングも広くて快適。バスルームも2つ。お湯もいい感じで水圧も十分です。部屋に洗濯機もあり。喫煙ルームもあります。キッチンには電子レンジがありません。インドネシアはみんなないのかな？次も絶対にここに宿泊します。歩いて15分の所にモールがあり、ラーメン屋や牛角やパパイヤで買い物が出来ます。帰りはgrabで10分程度でした。室内プールは温水プールでは無いようです。また、泊まりたいです。
洗濯機が結構うるさかったですが、それ以外は問題はなしです！
title: 至れり尽くせり

owner_response.text:
Dear andy1760013,

Wishing you a great day,

Thank you for your time in giving us the great gift of feedback during your stay with us at The Mayflower Marriott Executive Apartment Jakarta, we glad that you have enjoyed our three-bedroom apartments on your first stay with us. We do have microwave available based on request however our fully equipped kitchen is also available if you need to cook or heat up your meals. We are located in the center of Jakarta Business District at Sudirman Stretch the nearest shopping mall is indeed a walking distance of 15 minutes and the have an array of options for your needs.

We have noted on your feedback in regards to the washing machine and thank you for letting us know. Andy1760013, we are looking forward to welcome you back to your home in Jakarta

Warmest regards,
Alan Yuslan
General Manager

text: 在這裡待了一個月，也許這就是為什麼我可以看到更多這酒店的管理情況。酒店不是新的，一些房間條件需要重新裝修。但總的來說，這是一個很棒的公寓，特別是如果你想做飯和有朋友參觀。儘管發生了一些輕微的事故，這讓我對酒店的安全性感到困惑，但是運營經理專業地處理了這個問題，同時確保了客戶的中心性(customer centricity) 。我感謝她的快速反應和補救解決方案。早餐非常好，我特別喜歡量身定制的特色。
title: 非常好的公寓酒店，值得一試！

text:
Wij verbleven in een zeer ruim appartement op de 29e verdieping.. Wow! Wat een uitzicht! Kamer zag er keurig uit en alles perfect verzorgd. We kregen zelfs de New York Times smorgens in de kamer.

Het enige minpunt is het ontbijt. Weinig variatie voor Europese gasten die liever geen warme maaltijd eten. Daarnaast was het bedienend personeel niet alert. Wij hebben ruim een half uur aan tafel gezeten en niemand vroeg of we een kopje koffie of thee wensten. Ze kwamen dan wel langs om de tafels af te ruimen. Dat dan wel. Erg jammer gezien de hoge prijs die je voor het ontbijt betaalt.
title: Accommodatie top, maar ontbijt kan beter

text:
J'ai vécu 3 ans à Jakarta sans connaitre cette adresse qui était à 2 pas de mon travail... Pour des raisons professionnelles, j'ai du revenir sur Jakarta en avril et j'ai passé une semaine dans cette résidence.
Rien à redire: appartement très grand, propre et confortable, un personnel très serviable et sympa (comme souvent en Indonésie).
Petit bémol peut être, peu de choix pour un petit déjeuner à l'occidentale mais cela reste tout à fait correct.
Par contre attention si votre chambre donne sur Sudirman, avec la construction du métro et de la nouvelle tour en face, c'est un peu bruyant.
title: Tres bonne residence a 2 pas du travail

owner_response.text:

Our ultimate endeavor is to ensure our guests feel at home whenever they choose to experience us with best in class amenities and personalized intuitive service.

I am sorry to hear about the noise concern with regards to the MRT project, I am sure on your next visit we will have room facing Kuningan which will be away from any noise. We sincerely value your feedback and are now doing cyclic menu with more western options for our guests during breakfast. The team and I look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable experience.

Regards,
Shashank
General Manager

text:
ما يجذبني في فنادق marriott هو جودة السرير ومخدات النوم ولا يمكن ان تجدها في فندق اخر 
مرقع الشقق مميز ولكنه غير معروف لسائقي التكاسي 
واجهت مشكلة عند الوصول وهي تأخر تسليمي الشقة رغم حضوري الساعة ١٤ 
قال لي مدير الفندق ان الشقة سوف تكون جاهزة بعد ساعة فتركت شنطي لديهم وذهبت الى مول قريب وحضرت بعد ساعتين لاتفاجا بان الشقة ليست جاهزة !
وكان رد المدير ان الشقة لا زالت تحت التنظيف !! 
لم يقدم لي مشروب ترحيبي عند وصولي وهذه ليست من عادات فنادق marriott 
عند الحجز من موقع بوكنق كان المبلغ بالروبية الاندونيسية ولكن الفندق حاسبني بالدولار !! ولكن موقع بوكنق ارجع لي حقي منهم 
الشقق جميلة جداً ولكن من وجهة نظري ان ادارة الفندق تحتاج الى اعادة تقييم من قبل المدير الاقليمي لفنادق marriott
title: موقع مميز

text:
출장 겸 가족여행이고 작은 아이도 있어서 레지던스로 선택해서 갔습니다. 위치는 그랜드 인도네시아와 가깝지만 워낙에 차가 막힙니다. 실내수영장과 운동시설이 좋습니다. 조식공간은 좁지만 그래도 먹을만 합니다. 
체크아웃할 때 직원이 먹지도 않은 미니바가격을 차지해서 컴플레인 하고. 제가 사용한 금액 계산 할 때 보니까 10배가 넘는 금액을 카드로 긁어 아무렇지도 않게 싸인하라고 하더군요. 잘 확인하세요.

text:
部屋はきれいでキッチンもあるので、コンビニでラーメンかって料理できますし、
普通のホテル泊まるよりはサービスアパートメントの方が、お得感あります。
一階にはレストランが数件ありますが、偽物日本食とスパゲッティーです。

イタリアンの味は悪くないですが、日本人からすると中の下です。（問題ないがこれと言ってレベル）
偽物日本食レストランは、ダメです。インドネシア人向けです。
コンビニもありますし便利ですが、逆にこれだけしかない感じです。

スディルマンの反対側は日本食レストランがミッドプラザに3軒、インターコンチに2件、その裏のロフトシティーに行けば、ダイソーから日本食材やパパイア、バーキンに日本食2件、そのた多くのカフェあり。反対側の方が日本人には便利です。
この道を超えるための歩道橋はできも悪く、たまに治安の問題もあるので、人通りの多い明るい時間以外は利用は控えるように。
title: 立地は非常に便利なすでぃるマンの中心街ですが、食事と買い物は道の反対側なんです・・

text:
場所はジャカルタの中心部であるスーディルマン通りに面しております。オフィスビルを通り過ぎた所に入り口はあり、タクシーの運転手も分からずに迷ってしまいました。Indofood towerと言えば確実かもしれません。部屋は高層階にあり、夜は中心通りの明かりとオフィスビルの眺めが非常によかったです。部屋もリビング、キッチンなどついており、ランドリーもあります。長期の滞在には便利と思います。
ただ、高層階ということもあり携帯の電波が非常に悪いです・・。
家具もしっかりとしたものが使われているので、滞在というより、むしろ住むのによい環境ではないかと思います。またセキュリティもしっかり。朝食は、ロビー階にあるカフェでとれます。メニューはそこまで多くないですが、十分な内容と思います。
title: こんな所に住んでみたい！

text:
Excellent choix pour des sejours de plus d'une semaine. L'emplacement est pratique (tous les chauffeurs de taxi connaissent le nom de la tour et savent comment y aller), en face d'un arret de bus. Mon appartement etait immense et entierement equipe (four, plaques, frigo, fontaine d'eau,...) avec un lave linge (qui seche aussi).
Le service est bien. la cuisine est definitivement a revoir.
Good choice if you stay over 1 week: great location (every taxi I took knew about the tower name and how to get there), right in front of the bus stop, very VERY spacious with a fully equiped kitchen (oven, water fountain,...), a washing machine/dryer,...
Service is good, food is merely ok.
title: Good choice for long stay- Parfait pour des longs sejours

text:
C'est très intéressant quand on est en famille.
Il s'agit d'un appart hôtel. On a eu droit a un appartement assez spacieux avec 2 chambres et SD sépares avec dressing ds la chb de parents.
La cuisine américaine ouverte sur le salon avec tout ce qu.il faut. Une buanderie avec machine a laver et sèche linge. On vs donne même le liquide pr la machine. 1 écran plasma ds chaque chb et ds le salon, sans oublier la salle a manger.
Le pt déjeuner était compris, c'était très correct: buffet diversifié, céréales, yaourt, omelettes, noodles, pancakes, viennoiserie, gaufre et j'en passe. Ce pendant, la salle est petite, et des fois il y a une petite queue.
La piscine par contre est couverte, donc impossible de bronzer. Le massage n'est pas mal non plus.
Quant a l'emplacement de l'hôtel, on ne peut rien faire a pied, il faut prendre des taxis mais on est a 10 mn du grand Mall.
Le personnel est sympa et très serviable.
Je le conseille vivement si vs êtes de passage en famille a Jakarta.
title: Très pratique en famille

owner_response.text:

Your comments about our rooms and facilities are noted, appreciated and are most helpful. Assuring you of our commitment to continue to raise standards further for the benefit of all our valued guests.

As for the hotel location, the hotel is located in the business district of Jakarta and just like any other part of this city, traffic can be a problem during peak hours.   

Once again thank you for reviewing us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our apartment soon.

text: Für den Preis eines ganzen Appartments mit sehr viel Platz muss man erst einmal ein angemessenes Zimmer in der Stadt finden! Jakarta ist ein Moloch und man ist dankbar, wenn man sich abends zurück ziehen kann. Das Appartment war sehr ordentlich und bietet alles was man braucht. Nur das Restaurant lässt zu wünschen übrig. In einem Land wie Indonesien beispielsweise keinen frischen Obstsaft in einem 4* Haus zu bekommen, weder zum Früstück noch auf Bestellung, grenzt schon an einen Skandal. Das Frühstück ist totlangweilig - leider.
title: Geräumig

text:
ho soggiornato qui per due settimane,l'appartamento era nuovo, motlo grande e bello in stile moderno. pulizie tutti i giorni, giornale alla mattina, letto molto grande, cucina comoda e spaziosa
il bagno non aveva finestre e, anche se gli asicugamani venivano cmabiati ogni giorno, olte volte li ho trovati sporchi e macchiati e con una puzza incredibile di umidita'...la puzza non riusciva ada andare via dal bagno e dalla biancheria
il ristorante e' costoso rispetto ai ristoranti fuori, come e' costosa anche la spa, ed hanno poca scelta
non ci va motla gente quindi e' spesso vuoto. la colazione e; abbondante e intercontinentale. attorno c'e' poco e siccome a jakarta non si puo' andare in giro a fare una passeggiata,s e una sera si vuole andare in un ristorante bisogna chiamare un tazi
personale gentile
title: bell'appartamento,scarsi servizi
